tasks.title: Cloudflare Pages 배포 환경 최종 설정

subtasks.title: Configure GitHub Actions Workflow
subtasks.description: Set up a GitHub Actions workflow to automate the deployment process for Cloudflare Workers.
subtasks.details: Create and configure a YAML workflow file in the repository to trigger on push or pull request events, specifying steps for installing dependencies, running tests, and deploying using wrangler.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that the workflow triggers and completes successfully on code changes.

subtasks.title: Integrate wrangler for Deployment
subtasks.description: Integrate the wrangler CLI tool into the deployment pipeline for managing Cloudflare Workers deployments.
subtasks.details: Add wrangler installation and authentication steps to the pipeline, ensuring environment variables and secrets are securely managed.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run a manual deployment using wrangler in the pipeline and confirm successful deployment to the target environment.

subtasks.title: Implement Environment-specific Deployment Logic
subtasks.description: Set up logic in the pipeline to handle deployments to different environments (e.g., staging, production).
subtasks.details: Configure the workflow to select the appropriate environment based on branch or tag, and use environment-specific wrangler.toml settings.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test deployments to both staging and production environments, verifying correct configuration and isolation.

subtasks.title: Validate Deployment and Routing Configuration
subtasks.description: Ensure that deployed Workers are correctly routed and accessible in each environment.
subtasks.details: Check domain bindings, routing rules, and environment variables to prevent issues such as 404 errors after deployment.
subtasks.testStrategy: Access deployed endpoints in each environment and confirm correct routing and functionality.

subtasks.title: Automate Post-deployment Testing
subtasks.description: Add automated tests to verify deployment success and application health after each deployment.
subtasks.details: Integrate health checks and endpoint tests into the pipeline to validate that deployments are live and functioning as expected.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review automated test results after deployment and ensure failures are reported and handled.
